scripts.clean:reports: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); try { const dir = 'cypress/reports/mochawesome'; if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { fs.readdirSync(dir).filter(f => f.endsWith('.json')).forEach(f => fs.unlinkSync(path.join(dir, f))); } ['cypress/reports/merged.json', 'cypress/reports/merged.html'].forEach(f => { if (fs.existsSync(f)) fs.unlinkSync(f); }); ['cypress/reports/html', 'cypress/reports/cypress'].forEach(d => { if (fs.existsSync(d)) fs.rmSync(d, {recursive: true, force: true}); }); console.log('Relat√≥rios limpos com sucesso!'); } catch(e) { console.log('AVISO - Erro na limpeza:', e.message); }"
scripts.clean:reports:full: powershell -Command "Remove-Item 'cypress/reports' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item 'cypress/screenshots' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item 'cypress/videos' -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
